summary: A young family are stranded at the Eden Lodge. The people they meet are being killed one by one. They must fight to save their marriage, their family, and most of all their lives.
cast: Aggy K. Adams|Georgina Blackledge|Cyd Casados|Ivy Corbin|Ellie Dickens|Dominic Farrell|Ben Gardner Gray|Georgio Costa Houtris|James Killeen|Garry Mannion|Andrew McDonald|Jake Unsworth
keywords: parent child relationship|one word title|british horror
title: Eden Lodge
